## SecretStorage.setSecret() method

Sets a secret in the storage.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setSecret(id: string, secret: string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  <code>id</code> | <code>string</code> | Lowercase alphanumeric ID with optional dashes |
|  <code>secret</code> | <code>string</code> | The secret value to store |

**Returns:**

`void`

## Exceptions

Error if ID is invalid

 1.11.4
